remarks: Membership in the class of path homotopies between two continuous functions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
statement:
isphtpy.2 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( II Cn J ) ) $.
isphtpy.3 $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( II Cn J ) ) $.
phtpyi.1 $e |- ( ph -> H e. ( F ( PHtpy ` J ) G ) ) $.
phtpyi $p |- ( ( ph /\ A e. ( 0 [,] 1 ) ) -> ( ( 0 H A ) = ( F ` 0 ) /\ ( 1 H A ) = ( F ` 1 ) ) ) $.
